argument.name: notIndefinite
argument.desc: Finish command when no more wares to collect

line.comment: * Cycle through wares being actively hunted and check if they've ceased to exist - if yes then send the assigned drone back to the carrier.
* Command Carrier Return informs other scripts that this drone is not busy.
* Check each flying ware. If no drone can transport it then remove it and assign to $ignore.wares for future loops

line.text: 'No drone cargo bay sufficient for ware'

line.comment: * Remove any wares the player doesn't know about
* Check if flying ware is currently being hunted
* Run through available drones and find one that can be assigned to ware, and then send it after it
* Check if there are no drones left.
* Record biggest possible cargo bay for each transport class into table. This will be used to check each ware to check if any drone can transport it.

line.text: 'Drone Examples, an example of each type of drone in the carrier:'

sval.val: No drone cargo bay sufficient for ware
Ware is not known by player
Drone Examples, an example of each type of drone in the carrier:
Finish command when no more wares to collect
Cycle through wares being actively hunted and check if they've ceased to exist - if yes then send the assigned drone back to the carrier.
Command Carrier Return informs other scripts that this drone is not busy.
Check each flying ware. If no drone can transport it then remove it and assign to $ignore.wares for future loops
Remove any wares the player doesn't know about
Check if flying ware is currently being hunted
Run through available drones and find one that can be assigned to ware, and then send it after it
Check if there are no drones left.
Record biggest possible cargo bay for each transport class into table. This will be used to check each ware to check if any drone can transport it.
